name: Category Chart
description: The Category Chart component allows you to display data in the form of charts. You can also choose a chart type.

properties.name: disabled
properties.label: Disabled
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to disable the component.
properties.settingTooltip: Flag indicating whether the component is disabled or enabled by default.

properties.name: height
properties.label: Height
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the height of a component.

properties.name: width
properties.label: Width
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the width of a component.

properties.name: chartTitleVisibility
properties.label: Chart Title Visibility
properties.settingTooltip: Flag indicating whether the chart title is hidden or displayed by default.

properties.name: chartTitleFontSize
properties.label: Chart Title Font Size
properties.settingTooltip: The font size of the chart title.

properties.name: chartBackgroundColor
properties.label: Chart Background Color
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify a background color for the chart.

properties.name: chartLegendVisibility
properties.label: Chart Legend Visibility
properties.settingTooltip: Flag indicating whether the chart legend is hidden or displayed by default.

properties.name: yGridLineVisibility
properties.label: Y Grid Line Visibility
properties.settingTooltip: Flag indicating whether the chart's vertical grid line is hidden or displayed by default.

properties.name: xGridLineVisibility
properties.label: X Grid Line Visibility
properties.settingTooltip: Flag indicating whether the chart's horizontal grid line is hidden or displayed by default.

properties.name: gridLinesColor
properties.label: Grid Lines Color
properties.settingTooltip: The color of the chart grid lines.

properties.name: gridLinesWidth
properties.label: Grid Lines Width
properties.settingTooltip: The thickness of the chart grid lines.

properties.name: labels
properties.label: Labels
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to set chart labels that are used to indicate the index axis (x-axis by default).
properties.settingTooltip: Labels that are used to indicate the index axis (x-axis by default).

properties.name: datasets
properties.label: Datasets
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to set datasets for drawing the chart.
properties.settingTooltip: The datasets for drawing the chart.

properties.name: options
properties.label: Options
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to set additional options for the chart.
properties.settingTooltip: A set of additional chart options.
